Pre-Game Insights: Equatorial Guinea will be riding high after they held fancied Nigeria to a 1-1 draw in their opening match.
Equatorial Guinea was in good form, winning twice and drawing twice in their four matches ahead of the tournament.
Guinea Bissau started poorly in Group A, losing 2-0 against the hosts and favorites Ivory Coast.
They were on a poor run of form ahead of the opener, winning once, drawing once, and losing twice in the lead-up to the tournament.
